paper_abstract: A compact DC offset correction circuit based on the intrinsic properties of quasi-floating gate (QFG) transistors is presented. The proposed scheme uses a tuning mechanism to make its initial response faster improving the traditional large settling time of these circuits. A zero-IF baseband receiver chain suitable for Bluetooth that includes the proposed dc offset correction has been designed in a 0.18 mu m CMOS technology at 1.2 V supply voltage.
paper_title: DC offset control with application in a zero-IF 0.18 mu m CMOS Bluetooth receiver chain
